edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_team

Class Ninja

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_team.EntityMovement
      • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_team.Ninja
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Entity, java.io.Serializable

    public class Ninja
extends EntityMovement
    This class represents a ninja in the game. These are the game's enemies.
    See Also:

      • ninjaMovement

        public void ninjaMovement(Entity[][] grid,
                 Entity emptySpace,
                 boolean hardmode)
        This method determines ninja movement.
        Parameters:
        grid - Game board
        emptySpace - The space the ninja is occupying
        hardmode - Determines if the game is in hard mode

      • hardmodeNinjaAI

        private boolean hardmodeNinjaAI(Entity[][] grid,
                      Entity emptySpace)
        This method is used to determine ninja movement on hard mode. The ninja moves after the player if they come close to each other.
        Parameters:
        grid - Game board
        emptySpace - The space the ninja is occupying
        Returns:
        Will return true if the ninja can move there or false if it cannot

      • normalNinjaAI

        public void normalNinjaAI(Entity[][] grid,
                 Entity emptySpace)
        This method determines ninja movement when not on hard mode. The ninja movement is random.
        Parameters:
        grid - Game board
        emptySpace - Space the ninja is occupying

      • ninjaLook

        private boolean ninjaLook(Entity[][] grid)
        This method is used to check if the ninja has any open spaces surrounding it.
        Parameters:
        grid - Game board
        Returns:
        true if any spaces surrounding ninja are empty
